name: Chain Lightning Cascade
description: When Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning, who has this card equipped, is defeated or triggers Electric Rebirth: Discard this card, and cause the opponent's active character to lose 1 Energy.
descriptionraw: When $[A2406], who has this card equipped, is defeated or triggers <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124061]</color>: Discard this card, and cause the opponent's active character to lose 1 $[K310].
descriptionreplaced: When Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning, who has this card equipped, is defeated or triggers <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electric Rebirth</color>: Discard this card, and cause the opponent's active character to lose 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>.
